pull.title: qt, wallet: Revamp SendConfirmationDialog
pull.body:
Fix #15667

With this PR:
![Screenshot from 2019-04-24 23-47-30](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/56692672-63400b00-66eb-11e9-87f6-15957c6e81f7.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-04-24 23-47-40](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/56692681-663afb80-66eb-11e9-8b04-8a342026ada6.png)

verification.payload:
tree 199311357da1b43c9d7880b4b749d5ac8e409a68
parent 40a720acb8472f6e8afdf8b8d1897f35d58daf1f
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1556132170 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1556132170 +0300

Make SendConfirmationDialog fully fledged

The property-based API has been used. Added support for the
`informativeText` and `detailedText` properties.

events.message:
Make SendConfirmationDialog fully fledged

The property-based API has been used. Added support for the
`informativeText` and `detailedText` properties.

verification.payload:
tree 2a0439430554e68c8333dfea83bc11b8963e03a3
parent 654e419549fb5f1c360843d48e66eb098bbf5a83
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1556138175 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1556138175 +0300

Show recipient list as detailedText of QMessageBox

events.message: Show recipient list as detailedText of QMessageBox

events.body:
utACK 2ee756f, TIL `detailedText`!

This is enough to fix #15667 and in a follow the detailed text can be improved. For instance, there's no point printing "from wallet" for each recipient I think.

Nice work!
I also wasn't aware of `QMessageBox::setDetailedText()`.
utACK 2ee756f0411c467fc638373ea68d6cb5ced46974
Tested a bit. I think the "show details..." approach should only appear if we have multiple recipients. But I'm open to be convinced otherwise.

@promag @jonasschnelli 
Thank you for your reviews.

> I think the "show details..." approach should only appear if we have multiple recipients.

Nice. Done.

events.message: Do not show list for the only recipient.
